game.name: Zombie Drive
game.description:
Many gamers like you get excited after hearing the word “Zombies”. We have tried here to take your excitement to a completely new level by introducing a brand new action packed challenge named Zombie Drive where nothing exists except a huge destruction. When you enter the game, you will see a horde of deadly and blood-thirsty zombies coming to you. Your job in this free online shooting game is to kill all zombies and prove yourself as a protector of the city. 
Collect the antitode from your nearest lab and get ready to take down all the zombies that you see on your way. Make sure to guard the entrance by shooting any zombie. Try to shoot on their head to score big and drive your car to the destination fast. These blood-thirsty souls will not show pity on you and attack you in case of being rushed to the hospital. Do not show sympathy for zombies and run over them with your vehicle as your mission is to keep your city away from these bad souls. 
Avoid all the obstacles that try to damage your vehicle in this 3D driving car game. Do not forget to collect some fuel that you see on your way to improve your killing power. Get ready to unlock many achievements by killing as many flesh eating zombies as you can. Apply your best car driving skills to be a legendary driver of your city. Avoid your car from being crashed on your way before you complete your mission. Our free online game website features many more zombie games for boys and girls. Check out our huge collection of online car racing games to fulfil your craving for speed.
